DOC.detailed_description: - Eligibility determine , Individuals enrol consent join study - Short Intake Survey ( demographic baseline health information collect ) - Health History Survey ( two day participant enrolls study ) - Survey question current health medical history send participant weekly . If participant prenatal visit week , additional question ask . - Twins / Multiples survey begin appear participant indicate one baby - Participants submit home measurement , weight blood pressure frequently want HealthKit . - Pregnancy outcome variable . ( Miscarriage , stillbirth , birth healthy baby , pregnancy end ) also ask weekly . - If baby bear , question labor delivery , well weight , size birth date baby ask . A reminder fill outcome survey give 4 week user 's due date .
